attributes.action: allow all working parents access to affordable child care
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At present only parents who are on low incomes can claim the childcare element of working families tax credit. 

This does not create a level playing field, and, is unfairly advantageous to people with low levels of education. 

I believe that 'affordable childcare' should be either the right of everyone (non-means tested) or no-one. 

There is no incentive to work hard at school to get good qualifications and a good job when you leave education because uneducated, low income people end up with the same amount of money at the end of each month. 

EQUALITY PLEASE.
